function.description: Calculate the total number of ants for two species based on given growth rates and initial conditions.
function.name: calculate_total_ants

growth_a.description: Growth factor for Species A per day.

growth_b.description: Growth factor for Species B per day.

initial_species_a.description: Initial number of ants of Species A.

initial_species_b.description: Initial number of ants of Species B.

function.description: Calculate the total cost given the price per item and quantities.
function.name: calculate_total_cost

pounds_of_beans.description: The number of pounds of beans purchased.

pounds_of_corn.description: The number of pounds of corn purchased.

price_per_pound_beans.description: Cost per pound of beans in cents.

price_per_pound_corn.description: Cost per pound of corn in cents.

function.description: Solve linear equations of the form ax + b = 0.
function.name: solve_linear_equation

function.description: Safely evaluate mathematical expressions and handle errors gracefully.
function.name: evaluate_expression_safe

function.description: Calculate the final cost of items based on prices and quantities.
function.name: calculate_final_cost

beans_price.description: Cost per pound of beans in cents.

corn_price.description: Cost per pound of corn in cents.

pounds_of_beans.description: The number of pounds of beans purchased.

pounds_of_corn.description: The number of pounds of corn purchased.

function.description: Calculate the result of an arithmetic expression involving operations and variables.
function.name: calculate_expression_result

function.description: Calculate the weighted average of two quantities. This could be helpful for multiple future problems.
function.name: calculate_weighted_average

weight1.description: The weight of the first value.

weight2.description: The weight of the second value.

weight3.description: The weight of the third value.

weight4.description: The weight of the fourth value.

function.description: Calculate the distance between two points in a coordinate system.
function.name: calculate_distance

x1.description: The x-coordinate of the first point.

x2.description: The x-coordinate of the second point.

y1.description: The y-coordinate of the first point.

y2.description: The y-coordinate of the second point.

function.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
function.name: evaluate_expression

function.description: Calculate the sum of an arithmetic series with a known first term, last term, and number of terms.
function.name: calculate_series_sum

first_term.description: The first term of the series.

last_term.description: The last term of the series.

num_terms.description: The number of terms in the series.

function.description: Calculate the sum of a range of numbers in a specified series.
function.name: calculate_sum

end.description: The ending number of the series.

start.description: The starting number of the series.

step.description: The step increment for the series.

function.description: Calculate the sum of the first n odd numbers.
function.name: calculate_sum_of_odds

n.description: The number of odd numbers to sum.

function.description: Calculate the distance between two points in a Cartesian plane.
function.name: calculate_distance_between_points

x1.description: The x-coordinate of the first point.

y1.description: The y-coordinate of the first point.

y2.description: The y-coordinate of the second point.

function.name: evaluate_quadratic_expression

x_value.description: Value of x to evaluate the quadratic expression.

function.description: Calculate the number of pounds of corn and beans purchased based on total weight and cost per pound.
function.name: calculate_corn_and_beans

corn_price.description: Cost per pound of corn in cents.

total_weight.description: Total weight of corn and beans in pounds.
